questions.question: Choose the pair that best expresses the relationship similar to the one expressed by the pair of word in capital letters. TROPHY : CONTESTANT
questions.explanation: Original Pair: TROPHY : CONTESTANT ➡️ A trophy is something given to a contestant as an award . Option-by-option analysis ক — baton : runner A baton is not an award for a runner. It is an object carried by a runner in relay race. ➡️ Relationship = tool used by , not award given to . ❌ Doesn’t match. খ — pride : parent A parent may feel pride because of a child, but pride is not an award given to a parent. ➡️ Relationship = emotion felt by , not award given to . ❌ Doesn’t match. গ — book : bibliography A bibliography is a list of books. ➡️ Relationship = whole–part , not award–recipient . ❌ Doesn’t match. ঘ — loan : cashier A cashier does not receive a loan; a cashier gives (processes) a loan. ➡️ Relationship = giver–object , completely different from a contestant receiving a trophy. ❌ Doesn’t match. Correct: ঙ — honors : student Honors are awards given to a student , just like a trophy is an award given to a contestant . ✔️ Perfect award → recipient analogy. A trophy is an award given to a contestant . Similarly, honors are awards given to a student . Both pairs show an award → recipient relationship, which matches the original pair.

questions.question: Any of the following watchmen could be assigned on Wednesday EXCEPT
questions.explanation: দেখতে হবে কোনজন Wednesday তে কাজ করলে শর্ত ভঙ্গ করা হয়। প্রদত্ত শর্তানুসারে প্রত্যেকেই Wednesday তে কাজ করতে পারবে।

questions.question: P is assigned on which two days of the week?
questions.explanation: দেখা যায় P Sunday, Tuesday এবং Tuesday, Thursday এই দুই schedule এই কাজ করতে পারে। শুধু Monday তে থাকায় Monday তে পারবেনা। তাই answer হওয়া উচিত "cannot be determined."

questions.question: If Q is assigned on exactly four days of the week, which of the following could be the pair of watchmen assigned on Wednesday?
questions.explanation: Wednesday তে S কে থাকতে হবে।

questions.question: A company needs to assign tasks to employees P, Q, R, and S for the week. The following rules apply: S must be assigned on Wednesday and Thursday. P must be assigned on the same days as S (i.e., whenever S is assigned, P is assigned, and vice versa). No employee can be assigned tasks for three consecutive days. Q can only be assigned on Monday or Thursday. R cannot be assigned on Thursday. If P is assigned if and only if S is assigned, which of the following could be true?
questions.explanation: Option ক: P is assigned on Sunday P can only be assigned if S is assigned (if “P is assigned iff S is assigned”). S is only assigned on Wednesday and Thursday. Cannot be true → Sunday is not Wednesday or Thursday. Option খ: P is assigned on Tuesday Same reasoning as above: P cannot be assigned on Tuesday because S is not assigned on Tuesday. Cannot be true . Option গ: Q is assigned on Thursday Q is allowed to be assigned on Thursday (Rule 4). Thursday is fine for Q because P and S can also be assigned there without violating the 3-day rule. ✅ Can be true → Correct answer . Option ঘ: R is assigned on Thursday R cannot be assigned on Thursday (Rule 5). Cannot be true . Option ঙ: None of these Since Option গ can be true, this is incorrect . Correct Answer: গ) Q is assigned on Thursday

questions.question: If Q is assigned on only one day and R is assigned on four days, which of the following pairs of watchmen must be assigned on Tuesday?
questions.explanation: Q কে একদিন দায়িত্ব দেয়া হলে সে দিনটি অবশ্যই Monday. R কে চারদনি দায়িত্ব দিলে দেখতে হবে পরপর তিনদিন যেন দায়িত্ব না পড়ে। সেটা সম্ভব যদি R Sunday, Monday এবং Wednesday, Thursday কাজ করে অর্থাৎ Tuesday তে R এর থাকা সম্ভব নয়। Answer choice A, C ও D বাদ। এখন Q কে এবং S কে Tuesday তে দেয়া সম্ভব না কারন- এই প্রশ্নে বলা আছে Q শুধু একদিন কাজ করবে। আবার S কে দিলে পরপর তিনদিন হয়ে যায়। অর্থাৎ ওকে Tuesday তে কাজ করতেই হবে।

questions.question: A meadow in springtime is beautiful, even if there is no one to appreciate it. The statement above will be a logical rebuttal to which of the following claims?

options.label: ক
options.text: People will see only what they want to see.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: Beauty exists only in the eye of the beholder.

questions.option_d: Beauty exists only in the eye of the beholder.
questions.explanation: Question এ বলা হচ্ছে: কেউ প্রশংসা করুক আর নাই করুক "mealow in spring time" সুন্দর। অর্থাৎ এখানে বলা হচ্ছে সুন্দর জিনিস এমনিতেই সুন্দর। কিন্তু answer choice D তে বলা হচ্ছে সৌন্দর্য শুধুমাত্র যে দেখছে তার চোখেই exist করে। অর্থাৎ, D তে প্রদত্ত statement এর যুক্তি খন্ডিত (rebuttal) হয়েছে।

questions.question: A map representing countries R, S, W, X, Y and Z is to be drawn. Adjacent countries cannot be of the same color on the map. The countries adjacent to each other are as follows: R, S, X and Y are each adjacent to W. X is adjacent to Y. R and S are each adjacent to Z. Which of the following is a pair of countries that must be different in color from each other?
questions.explanation: ছয়টি দেশের (R, S, W, X, Y, Z) একটি ম্যাপ আঁকতে হবে। সংলগ্ন দেশগুলোর রং এক হতে পারবেনা। R, S, X, Y প্রত্যেকে W এর সংলগ্ন। X, Y এর সংলগ্ন। R ও S দুটোই Z এর সংলগ্ন। S ও Z পরস্পর সংলগ্ন। সুতরাং অবশ্যই different color হবে।

questions.question: A shoe seller sold one pair of shoes for 20 taka. The buyer did not have change and gave the seller a 100 taka note. The seller took taka 100 change since he had none in his cash box from a neighbor businessman and returned the buyer required change plus the shoe he bought. Moments later after the client had left the seller found that he was given a fake note. What was the amount of loss for the seller?
questions.explanation: Since the seller had bring the 100 taka change from his neighbor, he will have to pay the full amount to his neighbor. Total loss (100 + the value of the shoe)

questions.question: Which of the following is an acceptable assignment of the students to the two groups?
questions.explanation: We have: Group 1 Options: A) R, S, Y B) R, T, V C) T, V, X D) T, V, Y E) None of these Group 2 Options: T, V, W, X S, W, X, Y R, S, W, Y R, S, W, X The task is to find which Group 1 option corresponds to a valid assignment in Group 2 (i.e., all students are distributed without repetition). Check each option: A: R, S, Y Remaining students: T, V, W, X → matches Group 2 option 1 (T, V, W, X) ✅ B: R, T, V Remaining students: S, W, X, Y → matches Group 2 option 2 (S, W, X, Y) ✅ C: T, V, X Remaining students: R, S, W, Y → matches Group 2 option 3 (R, S, W, Y) ✅ D: T, V, Y Remaining students: R, S, W, X → matches Group 2 option 4 (R, S, W, X) ✅ So, all options A, B, C, D have corresponding valid assignments. ✅ Therefore, the correct choice is: E) None of these is NOT correct , because valid assignments exist. If the question asks which pair is acceptable , any of A-D with its corresponding group works.

questions.question: If R is in group 2, which of the following must also be in group 2?
questions.explanation: R group 2 তে থাকলে কে অবশ্যই 1 এ থাকতে হবে। আবার W1 থাকলে কে 2 তে থাকতে হয়; তাই R group 2 তে থাকলে W কে অবশ্যই 2 তে থাকতে হবে।

questions.question: In a certain project, five workers R, S, T, V, and W must be divided into two groups: Group 1 and Group 2 . The following conditions apply: R and T cannot be in the same group. S must be in the same group as T. V must be in a different group from R. If W is in Group 1 , which of the following must also be in Group 1 ?
questions.explanation: Answer: ঙ) None of these. Reason: The constraints allow two consistent assignments: If R is in Group 1, then T, S, V must be in Group 2. (So only R and W are in Group 1.) If R is in Group 2, then T, S, V must be in Group 1. (So T, S, V and W are in Group 1.) Since depending on the assignment any one of R, S, T, V can be either in Group 1 or not, none of them must be in Group 1 when W is in Group 1.

questions.question: If W and T are both in Group 2 , and X must also be in Group 2 , then which of the following pairs of students CANNOT be together in the same group ?

questions.question: If V is in the same groups as Y, which of the following must be true?
questions.explanation: V ও Y এক group এ থাকা মানে তারা group 1 এ আছে। কারন group 2 তে ও কে একসাথে রেখে combination সম্ভব নয়। এখন ১ এর পক্ষে 1 এ থাকা সম্ভব না কারন তাহলে R ও একসাথে হয়ে যাবে। এখন R ও group 1 এ থাকতে পারে অথবা T ও group 1 এ থাকতে পারে কিন্তু কোনটিই must নয়। W কোনভাবেই 1 এ থাকবেনা কারন সেক্ষেত্রেও R ও একসাথে পড়ে যায়।

questions.question: If S is in group 1, which of the following must be true?
questions.explanation: S 1 থাকলে ও 1 এ থাকবে। 1 এর বাকীজন হবে R অথবা T; অর্থাৎ Y অবশ্যই ২ তে থাকবে।
